categories: Default Category,Default Category/SHOP,Default Category/SHOP/Tools & Brushes,Default Category/SHOP/Tools & Brushes/Hair Brushes and Combs,Default Category/SHOP/Tools & Brushes/Hair Brushes and Combs/Hair Combs
name: Y.S. Park Carbon Mini Pin Tail Comb 180Mm
description:
Stylists can work in a group. Super short 180mm combs will keep them from interfering with each other while working.

PRODUCT FEATURES:
  • Extra thin tail (2,04mm) is optimal for delicate work.
  • The tail is equal thickness from root to tip, which is ideal for foil work (highlight) and avoiding stray hairs from catching, when rolling hair.
  • From tip to tail every next tooth of the comb is located 0.01 mm closer. This design helps to evenly allocate the pressure during the combing.
  • Thanks to the double layered hand grip, the comb will not slip out of your hands.
  • The upper tooth is shortened to make parting the hair easier (facilitates sectioning).
  • Because the base of the teeth is square-shaped, the hair can be combed through easily without causing it to get stuck or pulled. –
  • Texturized plastic gives a natural soft touch similar to the feeling of natural leather.
  • Because of the holes in the spine, the comb is flexible and will not cause unnecessary pressure on the scalp or tension to the hair.
  • Made of super “imido” plastic, which will prevent chemicals from services from penetrating into, and damaging the comb.
  • S. Park uses an extremely durable plastic, which will not melt or get damaged due to high heat or friction.

name: Flex Carbon Barber Normal Comb
description:
S. Park's largest and longest barbering comb. It is strong and sturdy for a consistent and even guide.

 PRODUCT FEATURES:

  • Designed and shaped for the hand and fingertips for comfort.
  • The handle is shape for the head shape to create a precise guideline when checking cuts.
  • The constant presence of chemicals on the comb can be the cause of damage. 
  • Recommend washing the comb with water after use.

name: Y.S. Park Ys-280 Clipper Comb
description:
Great for maintaining a cutting guide when blending and fading the hair with ease. 

PRODUCT FEATURES:

  • The Y.S.-280 is a new edition to the great of Y.S. Park combs. 
  • It is made in two colors from a superior plastic.
  • The white in color resists up to 220C and 428F. 
  • The black in color, made by soft carbon, resists heat up to 110C and 230F. 
  • Designed specifically for clipper or shear over comb. 
  • This comb stands out for different reasons, from other combs in the Y.S. Park collection. 
  • Designed with the signature ventilation holes along the spine.
  • The spine is flexible, yet strong and sturdy to elevate sections of hair without compromise.
  • The handle is designed and shaped for the hand and fingers for comfort and ease.
  • The head of the spine is designed to the head shape to keep and precise and consistent 90 degree angle.
  • Great for beginners barbers and stylists.
  • The constant presence of chemicals on the comb can be the cause of damage.
  • Recommend washing the comb with water after use.

name: Y.S. Park Ys-282 Clipper Comb
description:
The YS-282 is a new edition to the great collection of Y.S. Park Combs. It is made in two colors from a superior plastic. The white color resists to up to 220C and 428F. The black color, made from soft carbon, resists up to 110C and 230F.
 
PRODUCT FEATURES: 
  • Designed specifically for clipper over comb and and clipper cuts.
  • This comb stands out not only from its larger spaced teeth and being overall larger in size. 
  • Designed with the signature ventilation holes along the spine.
  • The spine is flexible, yet strong and sturdy to elevate sections of hair without compromise.
  • The handle is designed and shaped for the hand and fingers for comfort and ease.
  • The head of the spine is designed to the head shape to keep a precise and consistant 90 degree angle.
  • Great for maintaining a cutting guide when blending and fading the hair with ease.
  • The larger spaced teeth and overall larger size can create the perfect flat top hair style.
  • Great for beginners barbers and stylists.
  • The constant presence of chemicals on the comb can be the cause of damage. 

Recommendation:
  • Wash the comb after use.

name: Quick Cut Grip Comb 185 Mm
description:
The large teeth are good for graduation and layering, while the thin teeth are fine detailing. 

PRODUCT FEATURES:
  • The large teeth are round which gives the effect of combing with your fingers.
  • The row of teeth is divided into two sections; one for rough work, and one for fine detailing. No need to waste time switching combs!
  • The lightweight of the comb and ridges on the back provide a firm grip and comfort for long use.
  • The upper tooth is shortened to make parting the hair easier (facilitates sectioning).
  • Holes were made at 1 cm intervals for use as a measuring instrument.
  • The 1 cm distance between the holes in the spine of the comb allows for greater flexibility which reduces tension on the scalp. 
  • Its strong teeth allows easy and smooth combing of the hair.
  • The row of teeth is divided into two sections; one for rough work, and one for fine detailing.
  • Made of super �Imido� plastic, which will prevent chemicals from services from penetrating into, and damaging the comb.

  • �Imido� plastic, allow you to work for long periods of time without getting tired.
  • Texturized plastic gives a natural soft touch, similar to the feeling of natural leather.

description:
Y.S.Park teasing comb the narrow and balanced spacing of the ""Inner Fine Teeth"" is ideal for creating gorgoeus and volumous hair styles.

  • Double Zig-Zag lines
  • Each inner tooth has been uniquly designed in a �V-Line Shape� (Zig-Zag Design) to easily tease the hair and create volume.

  • The outter teeth are made of a more flexible material, while the inner teeth are made of a sturdier carbon to provide better tension.

categories: Default Category/SHOP/Hair Care/Shampoo & Conditioner/Shampoo,Default Category,Default Category/SHOP,Default Category/SHOP/Hair Care,Default Category/SHOP/Hair Care/Shampoo & Conditioner,Default Category/SHOP/Hair Care/Shampoo & Conditioner/Color Reviving Shampoo,Default Category/SHOP/Hair Care/Shampoo & Conditioner/No Yellow Shampoo
name: L'ANZA Healing Color Care Silver Brightening Shampoo 50 ml
description:
1. PRODUCT INFO :

L'ANZA Healing ColorCare Silver Brightening Shampoo brings out the sparkle in silver, gray, white, blonde and highlighted hair. Eliminates unwanted warm tones in the yellow to yellow-gold range.

2. FOR WHOM / USE :

Brings out the sparkle in silver, gray, white, blonde & highlighted hair

3. FOR WHAT / BENEFITS :

● Banishes brassy tones in blonde hair

● Brings out the sparkle in silver, gray, white, blonde & highlighted hair 

● Eliminates unwanted warm tones in the yellow to yellow-gold range 

● Sulfate-free formula keeps hair color lasting longer 

● Formulated without sulfates, gluten, sodium chloride or parabens

4. ABOUT THE COLLECTION :

L’ANZA Healing ColorCare formulations contain the same powerful anti-fade protectors flowers use for their own color retention, providing full-spectrum color protection for all shades of hair color. The incredible.Flower Shield Complex, proprietary to L’ANZA, provides the strongest defense possible against hair color fading and works under the harshest UV and environmental conditions, similar to nature.

name: L'ANZA Healing Color Care Silver Brightening Shampooing 50 ml
description:
1. INFORMATION DU PRODUIT :

L'ANZA Healing ColorCare Silver Brightening shampooing fait ressortir l'éclat des cheveux argentés, gris, blancs, blonds et méchés. Élimine les tons chauds indésirables de la gamme jaune à jaune-or.

2. POUR QUI / UTILISATION :

Fait ressortir l'éclat des cheveux argentés, gris, blancs, blonds et méchés.

3. POUR QUOI / BÉNÉFICES :

Bannit les tons cuivrés des cheveux blonds 

Fait ressortir l'éclat des cheveux argentés, gris, blancs, blonds et méchés. 

Élimine les tons chauds indésirables dans la gamme des jaunes à jaune-or. 

La formule sans sulfate permet à la couleur de durer plus longtemps. 

Formulé sans sulfates, gluten, chlorure de sodium ou parabènes.

4. À PROPOS DE LA COLLECTION :

Les formules de L'ANZA Healing ColorCare contiennent les mêmes puissants protecteurs anti-affadissement que les fleurs utilisent pour conserver leur propre couleur, offrant une protection complète de la couleur pour toutes les nuances de cheveux. L'incroyable complexe Flower Shield, propriété de L'ANZA, fournit la défense la plus forte possible contre la décoloration des cheveux et fonctionne dans les conditions environnementales et les UV les plus difficiles, comme dans la nature.

description:
1. PRODUCT INFO :

L'ANZA Healing ColorCare Silver Brightening Shampoo brings out the sparkle in silver, gray, white, blonde and highlighted hair. Eliminates unwanted warm tones in the yellow to yellow-gold range.

2. FOR WHOM / USE :

Brings out the sparkle in silver, gray, white, blonde & highlighted hair

3. FOR WHAT / BENEFITS :

● Banishes brassy tones in blonde hair

● Brings out the sparkle in silver, gray, white, blonde & highlighted hair 

● Eliminates unwanted warm tones in the yellow to yellow-gold range 

● Sulfate-free formula keeps hair color lasting longer 

● Formulated without sulfates, gluten, sodium chloride or parabens

4. ABOUT THE COLLECTION :

The incredible.Flower Shield Complex, proprietary to L’ANZA, provides the strongest defense possible against hair color fading and works under the harshest UV and environmental conditions, similar to nature.

2. POUR QUI / UTILISATION :

Fait ressortir l'éclat des cheveux argentés, gris, blancs, blonds et méchés.

● Fait ressortir l'éclat des cheveux argentés, gris, blancs, blonds et méchés. 

● Élimine les tons chauds indésirables dans la gamme des jaunes à jaune-or. 

● La formule sans sulfate permet à la couleur de durer plus longtemps.

name: L'ANZA Healing Blonde Bright Blonde Shampoo 300 ml
description:
1. PRODUCT INFO :

L'ANZA Healing Blonde Bright Blonde Shampoo is sulfate-free and gently purifies to keep all shades of blonde hair bright and shiny.

2. FOR WHOM / USE :

Specially formulated for natural & decolorized blonde hair. Removes dulling debris and unhealthy pollutants to keep the hair blonde, healthy and shiny.

3. FOR WHAT / BENEFITS :

● Deeply cleans hair

● Delivers illuminating sparkle & shine 

● Protects all shades of blonde hair color & toners 

● Works to prevent hair breakage

● Great for both warm and cool tone blondes 

● Formulated without sulfates, gluten, sodium chloride or parabens

4. ABOUT THE COLLECTION :

L’ANZA Healing ColorCare formulations contain the same powerful anti-fade protectors flowers use for their own color retention, providing full-spectrum color protection for all shades of hair color. The incredible.Flower Shield Complex, proprietary to L’ANZA, provides the strongest defense possible against hair color fading and works under the harshest UV and environmental conditions, similar to nature.

name: L'ANZA Healing Blonde Bright Blonde Shampooing 300 ml
description:
1. INFORMATION DU PRODUIT :

Le shampooinging L'ANZA Healing Blonde Bright Blonde est sans sulfate et purifie en douceur pour garder toutes les nuances de cheveux blonds brillantes et éclatantes.

2. POUR QUI / UTILISATION :

Spécialement formulé pour les cheveux blonds naturels et décolorés, il élimine les débris ternes et les polluants malsains pour garder les cheveux blonds, sains et brillants.

3. POUR QUOI / BÉNÉFICES :

● Nettoie les cheveux en profondeur

● Apporte de l'éclat et de la brillance

● Protège toutes les nuances de couleur blonde et les toners

● Prévient la casse des cheveux 

● Idéal pour les blonds chauds et froids

● Formulé sans sulfates, gluten, chlorure de sodium ou parabènes.

4. À PROPOS DE LA COLLECTION :

Les formules Healing ColorCare de L'ANZA contiennent les mêmes puissants protecteurs anti-affadissement que les fleurs utilisent pour conserver leur propre couleur, offrant une protection complète de la couleur pour toutes les nuances de cheveux. L'incroyable complexe Flower Shield, propriété de L'ANZA, fournit la défense la plus forte possible contre la décoloration des cheveux et fonctionne dans les conditions environnementales et les UV les plus difficiles, comme dans la nature.

description:
1. INFORMATION DU PRODUIT :

Le shampooinging L'ANZA Healing Blonde Bright Blonde est sans sulfate et purifie en douceur pour garder toutes les nuances de cheveux blonds brillantes et éclatantes.

2. POUR QUI / UTILISATION :

Spécialement formulé pour les cheveux blonds naturels et décolorés, il élimine les débris ternes et les polluants malsains pour garder les cheveux blonds, sains et brillants.

3. POUR QUOI / BÉNÉFICES :

● Nettoie les cheveux en profondeur

● Apporte de l'éclat et de la brillance 

● Protège toutes les nuances de couleur blonde et les toners 

● Prévient la casse des cheveux

● Idéal pour les blonds chauds et froids 

● Formulé sans sulfates, gluten, chlorure de sodium ou parabènes.

4. À PROPOS DE LA COLLECTION :

Les formules Healing ColorCare de L'ANZA contiennent les mêmes puissants protecteurs anti-affadissement que les fleurs utilisent pour conserver leur propre couleur, offrant une protection complète de la couleur pour toutes les nuances de cheveux. L'incroyable complexe Flower Shield, propriété de L'ANZA, fournit la défense la plus forte possible contre la décoloration des cheveux et fonctionne dans les conditions environnementales et les UV les plus difficiles, comme dans la nature.
short_description: Purifie en douceur pour que toutes les nuances de cheveux blonds restent lumineuses et brillantes.

● Faites mousser et rincez.
